#wtdraw #TADC

So, this is the last one for Rainy...Ngl ima miss doing Nadia sights because I enjoyed tracing her eyes so much. Props to Rainy's character fr. Enjoy! Going to work on requests now which one is a Camero for an RWSM Voice actor named Jappy. Then I go back to feet after that one. Enjoy yall! Special thanks to Rainy for having me trace his OC. Let me know if there are any problems
#anime #itzrainyboy #nadia #sight #wtdraw

And as always
"Nadia is love, Nadia ls ife"
-ItzRainyBoy 2025

Всем привет, прицел который я выкладывал ранее с девушкой обмотанную в бинты забанили из-за откровенности, поэтому я сделал прицел с Hornet Gigachad. Его забанить уже не должны.

Заглядывайте ко мне в Discord там я так же публикую прицелы и отвечаю на вопросы. Буду рад каждому новому участнику.

Discord: dcihn

#anime #guitar #explorer

Been gone for the past 2 months and I return with this; I'll probably disappear again for a while but not sure.
This sight when finished originally had 6322 objects but due to a hard limit of 4095 objects i wasn't aware of, I sadly had to drop the shading and smaller size support.
4 files: 1 center chest sight lol, and 3 to the side with 3 sizes.
Original artist on Twitter is @SkylosMinkan
